item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, March 2, 2025 at 7:15 AM UTC
item.description:

24. Drone captures narwhals using their tusks to explore, forage and play (60 points | 13 comments)

27. Certificate Transparency in Firefox (170 points | 97 comments)

29. 3,200% CPU Utilization (469 points | 207 comments)
